SMA RF connector
Build Option 1. On-Board T/R switch:  Mount PE4259 and P2 (antenna).  Omit P3.
Build Option 2. Separate Rfin and Rfout:  Mount P2 and P3.  Omit PE4259.  Jumper P5 to P8 and P6 to P7.
Build Option 3: There are different filter designs available on the Hermes-Lite group.
Build Option 4: Reduce R7 and R8 for higher power.  See frontend.html.
Build Option 5: Replace the OPA2674 with the OPA2677 package PSO-8 for higher power output
The Tx filter design is by Claudio, IN3OTD / DK1CG
The Rx filter design is by Andrew, G4XZL
